Home.description: A comprehensive project aimed at creating a trading environment free of Shariah-compliant concerns.
Home.whatIsCryptoDesc: Crypto Halal is a comprehensive project aimed at creating a trading environment free from Shariah-compliant concerns, leading participants in cryptocurrency markets to earn lawful income, free from interest (riba) or any prohibited forms of earnings. To achieve this goal, the Crypto Halal Shariah Supervision and Auditing Office was established in October 2021 by Dr. Mohammad Youssef Abu Jazar, an expert in comparative jurisprudence, specifically Islamic financial transactions. He is a member of the Islamic Economics Forum, the Palestine Scholars Association, and has been a Shariah arbitrator in financial cases for 12 years.
Home.visualReleasesDescription: More than 30 audio clips explaining the key principles of cryptocurrency trading, taught by experts in currency rulings, just for you.
Home.studiesAndResearchDescription: A collection of studies and research on cryptocurrencies, financial markets, and their technologies.
Home.newsDescription: Stay updated on Arab projects, contract news, and cryptocurrency market news.

Footer.description: A comprehensive project aimed at creating a trading environment free of Shariah-compliant concerns.
